metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_ADD_F16
metric.descr: Number of VALU ADD/SUB instructions on float16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MUL_F16
metric.descr: Number of VALU MUL instructions on float16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_FMA_F16
metric.descr: Number of VALU FMA/MAD instructions on float16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_TRANS_F16
metric.descr: Number of VALU transcendental instructions on float16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_ADD_F32
metric.descr: Number of VALU ADD/SUB instructions on float32. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MUL_F32
metric.descr: Number of VALU MUL instructions on float32. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_FMA_F32
metric.descr: Number of VALU FMA/MAD instructions on float32. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_TRANS_F32
metric.descr: Number of VALU transcendental instructions on float32. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_ADD_F64
metric.descr: Number of VALU ADD/SUB instructions on float64. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MUL_F64
metric.descr: Number of VALU MUL instructions on float64. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_FMA_F64
metric.descr: Number of VALU FMA/MAD instructions on float64. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_TRANS_F64
metric.descr: Number of VALU transcendental instructions on float64. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MFMA_MOPS_F16
metric.descr: Number of VALU matrix math operations (add or mul) performed dividied by 512, assuming a full EXEC mask, of data type F16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MFMA_MOPS_BF16
metric.descr: Number of VALU matrix math operations (add or mul) performed dividied by 512, assuming a full EXEC mask, of data type BF16. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MFMA_MOPS_F32
metric.descr: Number of VALU matrix math operations (add or mul) performed dividied by 512, assuming a full EXEC mask, of data type F32. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_INSTS_VALU_MFMA_MOPS_F64
metric.descr: Number of VALU matrix math operations (add or mul) performed dividied by 512, assuming a full EXEC mask, of data type F64. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_LDS_IDX_ACTIVE
metric.descr: Number of cycles LDS is used for indexed (non-direct,non-interpolation) operations. (per-simd, emulated)

metric.name: SQ_LDS_BANK_CONFLICT
metric.descr: Number of cycles LDS is stalled by bank conflicts. (emulated)
